snippet: Straight-ticket voting, or voting down party lines, is a popular way to choose candidates, but learning about down-ballot candidates might be better for everyone.
lead_paragraph: Straight-ticket voting, or voting down party lines, is a popular way to choose candidates, but learning about down-ballot candidates might be better for everyone.

headline.seo: Straight-Ticket Voting Takes a Trusting Soul
headline.main: Straight-Ticket Voting Takes a Trusting Soul
headline.print_headline: Straight-Ticket Voting Takes a Trusting Soul
